summary: Simple mod that lets you get a blessing from the altar of Molag Bal after his quest. Also adds enchanting table in the abandoned house.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that allows you to get a blessing from the altar of Molag Bal in the abandoned house after the quest House Of Horrors. The blessing is similar to normal shrines and simply cures disease and gives a +20 health boost.Â 

The mod also adds an enchanting table to the abandoned house in the same room as the bed.
author: QTom
